thread.title: Britain braces for FLOODING in wake of Storm Doris as country to be lashed by heavy rain after overnight temperatures plunge to -4C forming deadly black ice
thread.title_full: Britain braces for FLOODING in wake of Storm Doris as country to be lashed by heavy rain after overnight temperatures plunge to -4C forming deadly black ice

title: Britain braces for FLOODING in wake of Storm Doris as country to be lashed by heavy rain after overnight temperatures plunge to -4C forming deadly black ice
text:
Opinion STORM OF DEATH Britain braces for FLOODING in wake of Storm Doris as country to be lashed by heavy rain after overnight temperatures plunge to -4C forming deadly black ice 
The weather system brought gales of up to 95mph, snow and rain - causing travel disruption, downing trees, grounding planes and toppling large vehicles By GEMMA MULLIN, LAURA BURNIP and JOHN SHAMMAS 23rd February 2017, 5:10 pm
